INSERT INTO t_fundrecord (userId, recordTime, operateType, fundMode, handleSum, usableSum, freezeSum, dueinSum, trader, dueoutSum, remarks, oninvest, paynumber, paybank, cost, income, spending, borrow_id, repayment_id) SELECT #{userId}, NOW(), #{operateType}, #{fundMode}, #{handleSum}, a.usableSum AS usableSum, a.freezeSum AS freezeSum, SUM(b.recivedPrincipal + b.recievedInterest - b.hasPrincipal - b.hasInterest), -1, 0, #{remarks}, 0, #{paynumber}, '', 0, #{income}, #{spending}, #{borrowId}, #{repaymentId} FROM t_user a LEFT JOIN t_invest b ON a.id = b.investor WHERE a.id = #{userId} GROUP BY a.id;
